items.summary: Create a shared backend types module at `backend/types.mo` (it does not currently exist) and define an empty placeholder domain type for `Issue` as a public type alias (e.g., `public type Issue = {};`).
In `backend/types.mo`, define an empty placeholder domain type for `Task` as a public type alias (e.g., `public type Task = {};`).
In `backend/types.mo`, define an empty placeholder domain type for `FeedPost` as a public type alias (e.g., `public type FeedPost = {};`).
